---

# Create custom header

Creates a custom header with an image and a title. The image is represented as a base64 string in the code, which can be customized or replaced as needed.

```ts
(function () {
  // Get the active document
  let doc = Api.GetDocument();

  // Get the existing header
  let section = doc.GetFinalSection();
  let header = section.GetHeader("default", true);

  // Create a paragraph for the header
  let headerParagraph = Api.CreateParagraph();

  // Add a sample image in base64 format (e.g., ONLYOFFICE logo)
  let sampleImageBase64 =
    "data:image/png;base64,"; // Sample ONLYOFFICE logo in base64 format

  let image = Api.CreateImage(sampleImageBase64, 60 * 36000, 35 * 36000);
  headerParagraph.AddDrawing(image);

  // Add title text next to the logo
  headerParagraph.AddText(" Company Title");

  // Apply styling to the header paragraph
  headerParagraph.SetFontSize(24);
  headerParagraph.SetBold(true);

  // Insert the header paragraph into the header section
  header.Push(headerParagraph);
})();
```

Methods used: [GetDocument](/docs/office-api/usage-api/text-document-api/Api/Methods/GetDocument.md), [GetFinalSection](/docs/office-api/usage-api/text-document-api/ApiDocument/Methods/GetFinalSection.md), [GetHeader](/docs/office-api/usage-api/text-document-api/ApiSection/Methods/GetHeader.md), [CreateParagraph](/docs/office-api/usage-api/text-document-api/Api/Methods/CreateParagraph.md), [CreateImage](/docs/office-api/usage-api/text-document-api/Api/Methods/CreateImage.md), [AddDrawing](/docs/office-api/usage-api/text-document-api/ApiParagraph/Methods/AddDrawing.md), [AddText](/docs/office-api/usage-api/text-document-api/ApiParagraph/Methods/AddText.md), [SetFontSize](/docs/office-api/usage-api/text-document-api/ApiParagraph/Methods/SetFontSize.md), [SetBold](/docs/office-api/usage-api/text-document-api/ApiParagraph/Methods/SetBold.md), [Push](/docs/office-api/usage-api/text-document-api/ApiDocumentContent/Methods/Push.md)
